author: rgardler
msg: Add a build file for the osapi widgets.
Simply the way properties are set so we only need to change one now, to make widget build files work in any directory.

author: nick
msg: Fix bug #48968 - Implement support for HOUR, MINUTE and SECOND formulas
Includes some re-working of the existing Calendar functions, unit tests for the old and new Calendar functions, and a wider date+formula+formatting test for this area
